## Documentation Type
<!-- Select one or more -->
- [ ] API Documentation - Docstrings for functions/classes/modules
- [ ] README Update - Update project or module README files
- [ ] Development Plans - Epics, Features, or maintenance plans

## ADW Instructions
<!-- Documentation workflow focuses on creating clear, accurate documentation -->

**Context to read:**
- [x] Read docs/Agent/README.md for project overview
- [x] Review docs/Agent/documentation_guide.md for documentation standards
- [x] Review docs/Agent/docstring_guide.md for docstring format
- [x] Review docs/Agent/architecture/architecture_outline.md for system structure
- [ ] For ADRs: Review docs/Agent/architecture/decisions/template.md
- [ ] Additional context:

**Documentation requirements:**
- [x] Follow Google-style docstrings for Python code
- [x] Use proper Markdown formatting for .md files
- [x] Include code examples where appropriate
- [x] Ensure accuracy - verify against actual code
- [x] Check grammar and spelling

**Quality checks:**
- [x] Documentation is clear and understandable
- [x] Code examples are tested and work correctly
- [x] Links to other docs are valid
